SQL 拼接

Feb 13, 2015

 database  sql  database  Java

在java中进行SQL拼接是一件无比痛苦的工作，这是由于需要通过判断参数动态生成SQL

而且拼接时产生满屏幕的加号或者append，使SQL几乎失去了可读性，那么丢失WHERE，AND，逗号等语法错误将随之而来

最近研究mybatis时发现了一个非常好用的工具类 SQL Builder 1

示例

 1    @Test
 2    public void test(){
 3        String sql = new SQL(){ {
 4            SELECT("name");
 5            SELECT("password");
 6            SELECT("sex");
 7            FROM("student s");
 8            INNER_JOIN("info i on s.id = i.id");
 9            WHERE(String.format("name = '%s'","HanMeiMei"));
10        } }.toString();
11
12        System.out.println(sql);
13    }

运行结果为：

SELECT name, password, sex

FROM student s

INNER JOIN info i on s.id = i.id

WHERE (name = ‘HanMeiMei’ AND i.sex = 1)

SQL的拼接词都自动生成了

源码

事实上不必为了使用这个类而引入Mybatis，SQL Builder非常简单，简单到没有使用任何第三方类库，只需将这个类复制粘贴一下就可以直接用了。

SQL Builder 全部代码

  1import java.io.IOException;
  2import java.util.ArrayList;
  3import java.util.List;
  4
  5public abstract class AbstractSQL<T> {
  6
  7  private static final String AND = ") \nAND (";
  8  private static final String OR = ") \nOR (";
  9
 10  public abstract T getSelf();
 11
 12  public T UPDATE(String table) {
 13    sql().statementType = SQLStatement.StatementType.UPDATE;
 14    sql().tables.add(table);
 15    return getSelf();
 16  }
 17
 18  public T SET(String sets) {
 19    sql().sets.add(sets);
 20    return getSelf();
 21  }
 22
 23  public T INSERT_INTO(String tableName) {
 24    sql().statementType = SQLStatement.StatementType.INSERT;
 25    sql().tables.add(tableName);
 26    return getSelf();
 27  }
 28
 29  public T VALUES(String columns, String values) {
 30    sql().columns.add(columns);
 31    sql().values.add(values);
 32    return getSelf();
 33  }
 34
 35  public T SELECT(String columns) {
 36    sql().statementType = SQLStatement.StatementType.SELECT;
 37    sql().select.add(columns);
 38    return getSelf();
 39  }
 40
 41  public T SELECT_DISTINCT(String columns) {
 42    sql().distinct = true;
 43    SELECT(columns);
 44    return getSelf();
 45  }
 46
 47  public T DELETE_FROM(String table) {
 48    sql().statementType = SQLStatement.StatementType.DELETE;
 49    sql().tables.add(table);
 50    return getSelf();
 51  }
 52
 53  public T FROM(String table) {
 54    sql().tables.add(table);
 55    return getSelf();
 56  }
 57
 58  public T JOIN(String join) {
 59    sql().join.add(join);
 60    return getSelf();
 61  }
 62
 63  public T INNER_JOIN(String join) {
 64    sql().innerJoin.add(join);
 65    return getSelf();
 66  }
 67
 68  public T LEFT_OUTER_JOIN(String join) {
 69    sql().leftOuterJoin.add(join);
 70    return getSelf();
 71  }
 72
 73  public T RIGHT_OUTER_JOIN(String join) {
 74    sql().rightOuterJoin.add(join);
 75    return getSelf();
 76  }
 77
 78  public T OUTER_JOIN(String join) {
 79    sql().outerJoin.add(join);
 80    return getSelf();
 81  }
 82
 83  public T WHERE(String conditions) {
 84    sql().where.add(conditions);
 85    sql().lastList = sql().where;
 86    return getSelf();
 87  }
 88
 89  public T OR() {
 90    sql().lastList.add(OR);
 91    return getSelf();
 92  }
 93
 94  public T AND() {
 95    sql().lastList.add(AND);
 96    return getSelf();
 97  }
 98
 99  public T GROUP_BY(String columns) {
100    sql().groupBy.add(columns);
101    return getSelf();
102  }
103
104  public T HAVING(String conditions) {
105    sql().having.add(conditions);
106    sql().lastList = sql().having;
107    return getSelf();
108  }
109
110  public T ORDER_BY(String columns) {
111    sql().orderBy.add(columns);
112    return getSelf();
113  }
114
115  private SQLStatement sql = new SQLStatement();
116
117  private SQLStatement sql() {
118    return sql;
119  }
120
121  public <A extends Appendable> A usingAppender(A a) {
122    sql().sql(a);
123    return a;
124  }
125
126  @Override
127  public String toString() {
128    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
129    sql().sql(sb);
130    return sb.toString();
131  }
132
133  private static class SafeAppendable {
134    private final Appendable a;
135    private boolean empty = true;
136
137    public SafeAppendable(Appendable a) {
138      super();
139      this.a = a;
140    }
141
142    public SafeAppendable append(CharSequence s) {
143      try {
144        if (empty && s.length() > 0) empty = false;
145        a.append(s);
146      } catch (IOException e) {
147        throw new RuntimeException(e);
148      }
149      return this;
150    }
151
152    public boolean isEmpty() {
153      return empty;
154    }
155
156  }
157
158  private static class SQLStatement {
159
160    public enum StatementType {
161      DELETE, INSERT, SELECT, UPDATE
162    }
163
164    StatementType statementType;
165    List<String> sets = new ArrayList<String>();
166    List<String> select = new ArrayList<String>();
167    List<String> tables = new ArrayList<String>();
168    List<String> join = new ArrayList<String>();
169    List<String> innerJoin = new ArrayList<String>();
170    List<String> outerJoin = new ArrayList<String>();
171    List<String> leftOuterJoin = new ArrayList<String>();
172    List<String> rightOuterJoin = new ArrayList<String>();
173    List<String> where = new ArrayList<String>();
174    List<String> having = new ArrayList<String>();
175    List<String> groupBy = new ArrayList<String>();
176    List<String> orderBy = new ArrayList<String>();
177    List<String> lastList = new ArrayList<String>();
178    List<String> columns = new ArrayList<String>();
179    List<String> values = new ArrayList<String>();
180    boolean distinct;
181
182    private void sqlClause(SafeAppendable builder, String keyword, List<String> parts, String open, String close,
183                           String conjunction) {
184      if (!parts.isEmpty()) {
185        if (!builder.isEmpty())
186          builder.append("\n");
187        builder.append(keyword);
188        builder.append(" ");
189        builder.append(open);
190        String last = "________";
191        for (int i = 0, n = parts.size(); i < n; i++) {
192          String part = parts.get(i);
193          if (i > 0 && !part.equals(AND) && !part.equals(OR) && !last.equals(AND) && !last.equals(OR)) {
194            builder.append(conjunction);
195          }
196          builder.append(part);
197          last = part;
198        }
199        builder.append(close);
200      }
201    }
202
203    private String selectSQL(SafeAppendable builder) {
204      if (distinct) {
205        sqlClause(builder, "SELECT DISTINCT", select, "", "", ", ");
206      } else {
207        sqlClause(builder, "SELECT", select, "", "", ", ");
208      }
209
210      sqlClause(builder, "FROM", tables, "", "", ", ");
211      sqlClause(builder, "JOIN", join, "", "", "\nJOIN ");
212      sqlClause(builder, "INNER JOIN", innerJoin, "", "", "\nINNER JOIN ");
213      sqlClause(builder, "OUTER JOIN", outerJoin, "", "", "\nOUTER JOIN ");
214      sqlClause(builder, "LEFT OUTER JOIN", leftOuterJoin, "", "", "\nLEFT OUTER JOIN ");
215      sqlClause(builder, "RIGHT OUTER JOIN", rightOuterJoin, "", "", "\nRIGHT OUTER JOIN ");
216      sqlClause(builder, "WHERE", where, "(", ")", " AND ");
217      sqlClause(builder, "GROUP BY", groupBy, "", "", ", ");
218      sqlClause(builder, "HAVING", having, "(", ")", " AND ");
219      sqlClause(builder, "ORDER BY", orderBy, "", "", ", ");
220      return builder.toString();
221    }
222
223    private String insertSQL(SafeAppendable builder) {
224      sqlClause(builder, "INSERT INTO", tables, "", "", "");
225      sqlClause(builder, "", columns, "(", ")", ", ");
226      sqlClause(builder, "VALUES", values, "(", ")", ", ");
227      return builder.toString();
228    }
229
230    private String deleteSQL(SafeAppendable builder) {
231      sqlClause(builder, "DELETE FROM", tables, "", "", "");
232      sqlClause(builder, "WHERE", where, "(", ")", " AND ");
233      return builder.toString();
234    }
235
236    private String updateSQL(SafeAppendable builder) {
237
238      sqlClause(builder, "UPDATE", tables, "", "", "");
239      sqlClause(builder, "SET", sets, "", "", ", ");
240      sqlClause(builder, "WHERE", where, "(", ")", " AND ");
241      return builder.toString();
242    }
243
244    public String sql(Appendable a) {
245      SafeAppendable builder = new SafeAppendable(a);
246      if (statementType == null) {
247        return null;
248      }
249
250      String answer;
251
252      switch (statementType) {
253        case DELETE:
254          answer = deleteSQL(builder);
255          break;
256
257        case INSERT:
258          answer = insertSQL(builder);
259          break;
260
261        case SELECT:
262          answer = selectSQL(builder);
263          break;
264
265        case UPDATE:
266          answer = updateSQL(builder);
267          break;
268
269        default:
270          answer = null;
271      }
272
273      return answer;
274    }
275  }
276}
277
278
279public class SQL extends AbstractSQL<SQL> {
280
281  @Override
282  public SQL getSelf() {
283    return this;
284  }
285
286}

  1. http://mybatis.github.io/mybatis-3/statement-builders.html ↩
